report.title: Only A Dream
report.author: Psilocyborg
report.bodytext: I begin to lose contact /n From my so familiar scene /n Objects begin to become real /n 'Could this be only a dream?' /n /n Clouds are moving around me /n Familiar faces are peeking /n But in the void lies the noble truth /n In which we are seeking. /n /n But once more I ask myself, /n 'Could this be only a dream?' /n /n There was no warning /n No call considered fair /n I must magnify my vision /n And remove myself from care. /n /n And in these moments /n So amazingly beautiful /n We are at peace with the Universe /n Ambitious and in control. /n /n But once more I ask myself, /n 'Could this be only a dream?' /n /n As the void is obtained /n and the noble truth in hand /n I shed a tear in fear /n This won't happen again. /n But I am very certain /n There's a journey see /n But once more I ask myself, /n 'Could this be only a dream?'
